column5: Hey guys, I have been watching my dad on this web site for some time now and I have finally signed up so I can have the privilage to talk also. I just thought I would let you guys know who I am.
Welcome aboard JR, you'll enjoy your time here.  You dad is a long standing & valued member of OFC and I'm sure you will be too.
I am sure you will find it much more interesting than just reading your dads input and others responses... Welcome, I look forward to your posts...  Cheers  Jen
Welcome to the club. Enjoy your stay.
Welcome to the board!  You already know all about us, so I look forward to learning about you through your reports.....oh...and now you can vouch for your dad's catches....LOL

Welcome young Fella! and enjoy all the info that is available on OFC....  Truly a family oriented site!  Gerritt.  PS... outfish that Dad of yours EVERY chance to get... and take photographic evidence of it!! LOL

I feel sorry for all OFC'rs. As if things weren't bad enough having to put up with me around here now you have JR. to put up with too!  Have a good time hangin' out here kiddo, they are a good bunch of folks here. Just keep the controversial opinions under your hat....something I don't always do but try my best to achieve.  (Honestly I really try to.)  But seriously, welcome aboard.
Welcome to the zoo Jr. I'm sure your contributions will be as good as your dads!  Maureen
